Package controller

Class ModifyAppointment

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyAppointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyAppointment extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
ModifyAppointment Class and methods. It contains the logic for the various buttons and fields found on the Update Appointment screen.
Author:
Brian Clavadetscher

  • Method Details

    • onActionCancel

      void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Returns to the Appointment menu
      Parameters:
      event - The cancel button was activated
      Throws:
      IOException - If load fails

    • onActionSaveAppt

      void onActionSaveAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Validates that all appointment data fields are not empty. Validates selected times. Prepares appointment data and writes it to the database. Reloads the appointment menu.
      Parameters:
      event - The save button is activated.
      Throws:
      IOException - If load fails.

    • onActionStartTimeComboBox

      void onActionStartTimeComboBox()
      Filters the end times ComboBox based on the start time chosen.

    • sendAppointment

      public void sendAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Sends Appointment data to the ModifyAppointment screen. Prepares the ComboBoxes with valid options.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment data that will be sent.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the ModifyAppointment controller. Determines the zone to display.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
